name: A Fight For Relo
description:
Welcome to the world of Alactra. You join us mid war in our efforts to collect Relo.  Will you protect or collect? 

This is a voxel art rpg made with some future mmo aspects in mind. It is very much still in development.

The video goes through controls and more on how to play in a short look at the game
